main_definition: To move forward or make progress, often in a particular field or endeavor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Moving ahead in position or place
meanings_and_examples.example: The hikers advanced to the mountaintop after hours of climbing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Paying money before receiving goods or services
meanings_and_examples.example: She had to make an advance payment for her new apartment rental.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Making progress in skill, knowledge, or abilities
meanings_and_examples.example: With continuous practice, he made significant advances in his piano playing skills.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Providing an earlier version of something to test or review
meanings_and_examples.example: The company released an advance copy of the movie for critics before its official premiere.
